item.title: From Folklore to Film Sets: Inside Newfoundland’s Production Boom
item.description: From sea creature thrillers to Shakespearean fog and fairy tale cliffs, Newfoundland and Labrador is becoming Hollywood’s next great north-of-the-border backlot.
